title: 5 Minute Ab Workout
transcript: Hey everyone welcome back. Today we're doing a quick five minute ab workout. Let's start with planks...

title: POV: Cooking at 2am
transcript: It's 2am and you're hungry. So you decide to make instant noodles with an egg. The perfect midnight snack...

title: Sunset at the beach
transcript: Golden hour hits different. Nothing beats watching the sun go down over the ocean. Pure peace.
